column4: Grub2 will be default in ubuntu 9.10 Karmic ... probably not a good idea yet, as it isn't tested ... but if you want this ppa has it https://launchpad.net/~apw/+archive/ppa/+packages compiled for Jaunty
thanks... i'm trying to create a small partition with damn small linux on it, but can't figure out how to get it to boot with grub 0.97
have you considered running DSL as a virtual machine? might be easier
